template.p: Welcome to your Odoo Electrician Services package! This guide will help you manage your Electrician business efficiently, from scheduling jobs to invoicing clients.
Your Odoo Electrician Services package includes essential apps to streamline your operations:

ul.li: Use the Field Service app to manage service requests, schedule jobs, and track completion
Track leads and opportunities with the CRM app
Create professional quotes with the Sales app
Manage your tools and equipment with the Inventory app
Keep track of time spent on jobs with Timesheets

div.class: o_editor_banner o_not_editable lh-1 d-flex align-items-center alert alert-warning pb-0 pt-3

div.p: If you want to easily discover every features of this package, try downloading the Demo Data.
You can still do it by upgrading your package in Apps.
Just be careful, once demo data are uploaded, it cannot be easily deleted. But you can restart a fresh database on Odoo.com/trial

template.p: The Field Service app is your central hub for managing jobs:

ul.li: Create and track service tickets for each job request
Assign jobs to colleagues based on skills and location
Document work with photos and detailed notes
Track parts and materials used on each job
Generate on-site work orders and completion reports

div.class: o_editor_banner user-select-none o_not_editable lh-1 d-flex align-items-center alert alert-info pb-0 pt-3

div.p: The module enhances the creation of vendor bills directly from the Field Service App, ensuring better tracking of the budget for material consumption.

In combination with the Client Rating system for tasks and Timesheet management, it provides a comprehensive three-way tracking of your performance, allowing you to manage your business more precisely than ever.

template.p: The CRM app helps track leads and manage customer relationships:

ul.li: Capture and qualify new service requests
Track ongoing opportunities and estimates
Store detailed customer history and preferences
Follow up on quotes and maintenance reminders
Monitor your sales pipeline

template.p: The Appointment app streamlines your booking process:

ul.li: Set up different appointment types for various services
Define your availability and working hours
Enable online booking for clients
Send automatic reminders and confirmations

template.p: The Sales app helps create professional quotes:

ul.li: Build detailed estimates for complex jobs
Include materials and labor costs
Set up standard pricing for common services
Track quote acceptance and conversion rates
Generate professional-looking documents

div.class: o_editor_banner user-select-none o_not_editable lh-1 d-flex align-items-center alert alert-info pb-0 pt-3

div.p: You may want to use the quote calculator feature to compute your material cost without detailing everything in your quotation.

template.p: The Inventory and Purchase apps help manage your tools and supplies:

ul.li: Track your equipment and materials inventory
Monitor tool assignments to technicians
Set reordering points for common supplies
Process material receipts and returns

template.p: The Timesheet app helps monitor job efficiency:

ul.li: Log time spent on each service call
Track travel time between jobs
Monitor technician productivity
Generate accurate billing based on time
Analyse job profitability
